content: # Barber Cam ‚Äî FAQ## What is Barber Cam?Barber Cam is a citizen-led accountability initiative focused on ethical documentation, due process, and dignity. The goal is to preserve accurate records and reduce harm through responsible recording practices.## Is Barber Cam law enforcement?No. Barber Cam is not a government agency, not law enforcement, and not affiliated with any department.## Is this ‚Äúsurveillance‚Äù?No. Barber Cam is not designed for mass monitoring or covert tracking.
